statements: DELETE FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Social Media';
DELETE FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Social Media Ads' AND target_audience = 'Teenagers';
DELETE FROM A_B_Test_Results WHERE test_date >= '2022-01-01' AND result < 50.00;
DELETE FROM ab_test_results WHERE winner = true;
DELETE FROM ab_test_results WHERE winner = TRUE AND significance_level > 0.95;
DELETE FROM test_results WHERE group_id = 1 AND result_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM marketing_strategies WHERE id = 3 AND start_date > '2022-03-15';
DELETE FROM CampaignResults WHERE conversion = TRUE;
